General.Name: S F Capital Bhd
General.Description: S & F Capital Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the construction and property development businesses in Malaysia. The company develops commercial and residential properties; and undertakes the construction of houses and buildings infrastructure projects, and geotechnical and soil investigation works, as well as other related contract works. It also provides management services. The company was formerly known as Leweko Resources Berhad and changed its name to S & F Capital Berhad in January 2021. S & F Capital Berhad is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
